exceptions.exn: In environment l : lb Unable to unify "nil ⪯ ?M1394" with "l ⪯ l".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: lb

Goal:
l ⪯ l

Premises:
Notation lb := (list bool)
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_inv_nil : forall l : lb, ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil -> l ⪯ nil
in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_inv_left : forall (x : bool) (l : lb), x :: l ⪯ nil -> x = ⟘ /\ l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_leb : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_mask_inv_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⪯ y :: m -> x ⪦ y /\ l ⪯ m
in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l
lb_mask_inv_cons_nil : forall l : lb, ⟙ :: l ⪯ nil -> False
lb_mask_inv_cons_cons : forall l m : lb, ⟙ :: l ⪯ ⟘ :: m -> False
Ascii.N_of_digits = fix N_of_digits (l : lb) : BinNums.N := match l with | nil => BinNums.N0 | b :: l' => BinNat.N.add (if b then BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH else BinNums.N0) (BinNat.N.mul (BinNums.Npos (BinNums.xO BinNums.xH)) (N_of_digits l')) end : lb -> BinNums.N Arguments Ascii.N_of_digits _%list_scope
ZMicromega.ZChecker = fix ZChecker (l : list (RingMicromega.NFormula BinNums.Z)) (pf : ZMicromega.ZArithProof) {struct pf} : bool := match pf with | ZMicromega.DoneProof => ⟘ | ZMicromega.RatProof w pf0 => match ZMicromega.eval_Psatz l w with | Some f => if ZMicromega.Zunsat f then ⟙ else ZChecker (f :: l) pf0 | None => ⟘ end | ZMicromega.CutProof w pf0 => match ZMicromega.eval_Psatz l w with | Some f => match ZMicromega.genCuttingPlane f with | Some cp => ZChecker (ZMicromega.nformula_of_cutting_plane cp :: l) pf0 | None => ⟙ end | None => ⟘ end | ZMicromega.EnumProof w1 w2 pf0 => match ZMicromega.eval_Psatz l w1 with | Some f1 => match ZMicromega.eval_Psatz l w2 with | Some f2 => match ZMicromega.genCutting...
filter_map : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> map f l = map g l
ZMicromega.ZChecker_sound : forall (w : ZMicromega.ZArithProof) (l : list (RingMicromega.NFormula BinNums.Z)), ZMicromega.ZChecker l w = ⟙ -> forall env : RingMicromega.PolEnv BinNums.Z, Refl.make_impl (ZMicromega.eval_nformula env) l False
find_none : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), find f l = None -> forall x : A, In x l -> f x = ⟘
Ring_polynom.mkZmon_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rmul : R -> R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> forall (M : Ring_polynom.Mon) (j : BinNums.positive) (l : list R), req (Ring_polynom.Mphi rO rI rmul l (Ring_polynom.mkZmon j M)) (Ring_polynom.Mphi rO rI rmul l (Ring_polynom.zmon j M))
Field_theory.fcons_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R) (Fcons : Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)), (forall (l : list R) (a : Ring_polynom.PExpr C) (l1 : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)), Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l (Fcons a l1) -> ~ req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l a) rO /\ Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l l1) ->...
Field_theory.PCond_app : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R) (l : list R) (l1 l2 : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)), Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l (l1 ++ l2) < -> Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l l1 /\ Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l l2
BinList.jump_add : forall (A : Type) (i j : BinNums.positive) (l : list A), BinList.jump (BinPos.Pos.add i j) l = BinList.jump i (BinList.jump j l)
Ring_polynom.PNSubst1_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), Ring_theory.ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi ->...-> req (Ring_polynom.Pphi rO radd rmul phi l P1) (Ring_polynom.Pphi rO radd rmul phi l (Ring_polynom.PNSubst1 cO cI cadd cmul ceqb cdiv P1 cM1 P2 n))
Ring_polynom.Mphi_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> forall (P : Ring_polynom.Pol C) (cM : C * Ring_polynom.Mon) (l : list R), let (c, M) := cM in let (Q, R0) := Ring_polynom.MFactor cO cI ceqb cdiv P c M in req (Ring_polynom.Pphi rO radd rmul phi l P) (radd (Ring_polynom.Pphi rO radd rmul phi l Q) (rmul (rmul (phi c) (Ring_polynom.Mphi rO rI rmul l M)) (Ring_polynom.Pphi rO radd rmul phi l R0)))
Ring_polynom.POneSubst_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), Ring_theory.ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi -> forall cdiv : C -> C -> C * C, Ring_theory.div_theory req cadd cmul phi cdiv ->...-> req (Ring_polynom.Pphi rO radd rmul phi l P1) (Ring_polynom.Pphi rO radd rmul phi l P3)

filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : list A), In x (filter f l) < -> In x l /\ f x = ⟙
Ring.bool_ring_ring_lemma2 : forall (n : nat) (lH : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr bool * Ring_polynom.PExpr bool)) (l : lb), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) eq (Ring_theory.IDphi (R:=bool)) Ring_theory.id_phi_N (Ring_theory.pow_N ⟙ andb) l lH ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) (Ring_theory.IDphi (R:=bool)) Ring_theory.id_phi_N (Ring_theory.pow_N ⟙ andb) l pe = Ring_polynom.Pphi_dev ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) ⟘ ⟙ Ring.bool_eq (Ring_theory.IDphi (R:=bool)) (Ring_theory.get_sign_None (C:=bool)) l npe

Field_theory.Fnorm_crossproduct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> (forall p q : R, req p q -> req (rinv p) (rinv q)) -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req ->...-> req (Field_theory.FEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv phi Cp_phi rpow l fe1) (Field_theory.FEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv phi Cp_phi rpow l fe2)

Refl.make_impl_map : forall (A B : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (eval' : A * B -> Prop) (l : list (A * B)) (r : Prop), (forall x : A * B, eval' x <-> eval (fst x)) -> Refl.make_impl eval' l r < -> Refl.make_impl eval (map fst l) r
